title: Team Project 3: LootTracker
blurb: Gamers set and manage their spending budget by choosing games for their Wish Lists. MySql via Sequelize stores the data and React delivers the UI.

title: Team Project 2: FoodTrak
blurb: Gamers set and manage their spending budget by choosing games for their Wish Lists. MySql via Sequelize stores the data and React delivers the UI.

title: Team Project 1: Shuffle
blurb: Astrological app used API calls to aggregate zodia content as cards are flipped

title: Living Life on Burgers
blurb: Full Stack Application with Heroku deployment using JAWSDB.

title: Weather Dashboard
blurb: Weather Dashboard displays current weather at searched for city along with a five-day forecast. The weather curious can access the same info for any city they've previously explored.

title: Expense Tracker
blurb: React based app for tracking expenses by category.

title: Random Password Generator
blurb: Generates a random password based on user-selected criteria. Features dynamically updated HTML and CSS powered by JavaScript.
